includedAssets.title: A Child Of Denmark
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep1 - A Child Of Denmark
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte recruits Katrine to help her challenge Kruse for leadership of the Moderate Party.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Birgitte recruits Katrine to help her challenge Kruse for leadership of the Moderate Party.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Birgitte recruits Katrine to help her challenge Kruse for leadership of the Moderate Party.

includedAssets.title: The Land Built On Law
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - The Land Built On Law
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte decides to form her own breakaway party, but who will she choose to join her?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Birgitte decides to form her own breakaway party, but who will she choose to join her?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Birgitte decides to form her own breakaway party, but who will she choose to join her?

includedAssets.title: The Right Shade of Brown
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep3 - The Right Shade of Brown
includedAssets.synopsis: The New Democrats have plenty of followers, but a lack of funding. They also have to find a spokesperson for an immigration debate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The New Democrats have plenty of followers, but a lack of funding. They also have to find a spokesperson for an immigration debate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The New Democrats have plenty of followers, but a lack of funding. They also have to find a spokesperson for an immigration debate.

includedAssets.title: Their Loss...
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte's boyfriend Jeremy inadvertently helps her profile after getting sick from eating Danish bacon. Meanwhile, Katrine and Kasper argue.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Birgitte's boyfriend Jeremy inadvertently helps her profile after getting sick from eating Danish bacon. Meanwhile, Katrine and Kasper argue.

includedAssets.title: Thou Shalt Not Commit Adultery
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep5 - Thou Shalt Not Commit Adultery
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte and Katrine disagree over a potential ban on prostitution. Torben's boss finds out about his affair.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Birgitte and Katrine disagree over a potential ban on prostitution. Torben's boss finds out about his affair.

includedAssets.title: Sons Of The Past
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep6 - Sons Of The Past
includedAssets.synopsis: There's controversy in the press and the party when Birgitte suggest bringing a left-wing new candidate on board. Plus, Birgitte gets bad news.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: There's controversy in the press and the party when Birgitte suggest bringing a left-wing new candidate on board. Plus, Birgitte gets bad news.

includedAssets.title: The Fall
includedAssets.synopsis: The prime minister springs a surprise when he calls a general election. Meanwhile, Birgitte struggles to keep her treatment a secret.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The prime minister springs a surprise when he calls a general election. Meanwhile, Birgitte struggles to keep her treatment a secret.

includedAssets.title: If You Never Change Your Mind
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep8 - If You Never Change Your Mind
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte comes clean about her illness, before coming to suspect that there's a mole in her midst.

includedAssets.synopsis: As the election nears, the contenders go head to head in a debate.

includedAssets.title: The Election
includedAssets.synopsis: As election day arrives, the New Democrats find their popularity has increased as a result of Kruse's outburst.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte forms her own breakaway party in season three of the lauded Danish drama. In Danish with English subtitles.

includedIn.title: Borgen
includedIn.synopsis: After a hard-fought and unlikely victory, Birgitte Nyborg becomes Denmark's first female prime minister, but she soon discovers that winning power is just the start of the battle.
